name: The Great Giana Petscii Sisters
overview: We've certainly heard a lot about that famous platformer the Great Giana Sisters from 1987, especially as it came back to the Amiga as a Giana Special Edition by Reimagine Games and then of course the Great Giana-Sisters Construction-Set, whereby you can create your own levels. But this latest release as The Great Giana PETSCII Sisters on the C64 by Vintage Computing Carinthia, is something of a special breed and one you might be interested in checking out! With graphics by Logiker and coding by Will, this is a brand new release for the C64 in which much of the game has been remade in PETSCII graphics by Vintage Computing Carinthia released at Revision 2022 Online!
